title: FONTFEED's VALENTYPE: a contest for glyph lovers at large
content:
Do you love a FontFont face or an OurType font? Wouldn't you like to get it for free…? Declare your love for it and you might!  
And hurry! Only half a day left on the contest! You can join three times! We need at least fifty to make it count!

{This is [the “briefing”](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160503/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/valentype-2009/); this is [the gallery](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160503/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/valentype-2009-the-gallery/).}

Good luck! ;)
author: rubenDmarkes

comments.content:
There's still time! It's a chance to win your favourite [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160503/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/foundry/fontfont/) or [Ourtype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160503/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/foundry/ourtype/) typeface of all!

There's Quadraat, Meta, Din, Mister K, Kievit, Unit, Versa, Scala, Arnhem, Legato… if you love any of these fonts, this is your chance to get a single license of, for example, Regular, Italic, Bold and Bold Italic. And you can enter three times, which means you can get three chances to win one font or three chances to win three different faces of your liking! (Not to mention that, if you don't enter, no one will win, because we still need more entries to reach fifty!) So hop to it! ;D
Oh cripes, the deadline is midnight \*GMT\*? I'd better go make some coffee.

Wait.  
OK, really really stupid question: Does "Saturday, February 14th at midnight GMT" mean the midnight leading into Saturday, or midnight at the end of Saturday?
[Can't edit my last post, sorry:] OK, got it. Looks like it's still going on. :-)
We only need one more! There's still about an hour, I think ...

Yeah, midnight GMT should be an hour from now. God this is thrilling. (-:  
Love your submissions btw!

No more submissions. E-mail refused. I am confused. Isn’t GMT = CET + 1?  
According to my clock it should be still 10 minutes left.

:-(  
Yep, GMT should be in 1 minute.  
Yves! Help!
Somehow your e-mail came through, and it appears I might have confused GMT with CET time, so you actually _saved the day!_ Three cheers for Jan! :^D

I’m glad I saved the day for everybody that participated.  
But I was refering to _a second entry!_

BTW.  
The small number of entries might be just a sign of the times.  
It’s hard to be creative when you’re worrying about how to pay the rent.
